file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 27-71-11-04 - CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROMECHANICAL GUST LOCK 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the control-column position switch. B. The control-column position switch is a component of the electromechanical gust lock system. It is installed in the area below the cockpit floor. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - ELECTROMECHANI- 27-71-11-000-801-A REMOVAL CAL GUST LOCK AIRCRAFT WITH CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - ELECTROMECHANI- 27-71-11-400-801-A INSTALLATION CAL GUST LOCK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 27-71-11 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-71-11-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROMECHANICAL GUST LOCK 2. CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the control-column position switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Area below the cockpit floor 124 123BL Area below the cockpit floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber Gloves, Phosphate Ester-Base, Protection for the hands 1 available Fluid-Resistant Commercially Rubber Goggles, Phosphate Ester- Protection for the eyes 1 available Base, Fluid-Resistant F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Area below the cockpit floor I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the control column fully forward. (2) Set the gust lock system to the unlocked position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-71-11 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Make sure that the safety pins of the landing gears are installed AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200. (4) Remove control rigging door 123BL AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the splices (2). (2) Remove the bolt (1), washer (4), and nut (3) to remove the switch (5) from the support. (3) Remove the switch (5) from the support. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-71-11 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

WASHER 3. NUT 2. SPLICES DET. B 145AMM270555.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-71-11 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-71-11-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH ELECTROMECHANICAL GUST LOCK 3. CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the control-column position switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - ELECTROMECHANICAL GUST LOCK - OPERATION- AMM TASK 27-71-00-700-801-A/500 AL CHECK CONTROL-COLUMN POSITION SWITCH - ADJUST- AMM TASK 27-71-11-700-801-A/500 MENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 123 123BL Area below the cockpit floor 124 123BL Area below the cockpit floor D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Rubber Gloves, Phosphate Ester-Base, Protection for the hands 1 available Fluid-Resistant Commercially Rubber Goggles, Phosphate Ester- Protection for the eyes 1 available Base, Fluid-Resistant F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Area below the cockpit floor I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the control column fully forward. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-71-11 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Install the switch (5) on the support. (3) Use the bolt (1), washer (4), and nut (3) to connect the switch (5). (4) Connect the splices (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Adjust the switch. Refer to AMM TASK 27-71-11-700-801-A/500. (2) Do the operational check of the electromechanical gust lock system. Refer to AMM TASK 27-71-00-700-801-A/500. (3) Install control ringing door 123BL AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-71-11 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
